PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1995-02611995-02-210,  ND,  TB,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN CADET ORGANIZATIONS which remove the $400 maximum limit on the training bonus payable for extended cruises and will allow the Chief of the Defence Staff to specify the rates and duration for approved courses, cruises or exchange programs (Articles 7.13 and 7.15).
Attachments
